p: The emulsions were prepared following the spreadsheet design shown in Table 1. This spreadsheet includes two surfactants: one of a lipophilic nature [Span 80®, HLB=4.3] and the other of a hydrophilic nature [Tween 20®, HLB=16.7]. The final HLB value of each system varied according to the relative proportion of each surfactant.[19]
